summary: Comprehensive testing of SeknuTo.cz lawn care service website. All features tested and working correctly including email popup, newsletter subscription, 5-step booking flow, pricing calculator, coupon validation, and navigation.

design_issues.issue: REACT_APP_GA_ID not configured in environment variables
design_issues.note: Component loads correctly but GA tracking is not active - optional configuration

passed_tests: API health check - /api/ returns running status
Pricing calculation - basic lawn mowing (2 Kč/m²)
Pricing calculation - lawn with fertilizer (3.33 Kč/m²)
Pricing calculation - overgrown condition multiplier (1.5x)
Pricing calculation - spring package tiered pricing (small/medium/large)
Pricing calculation - additional services (mulching, debris removal)
Availability API - returns future dates excluding Sundays
Email subscription - new email returns unique coupon code
Email subscription - duplicate email returns existing coupon
Email subscription - invalid email returns 422 error
Coupon validation - valid coupon returns 5% discount
Coupon validation - invalid coupon returns 404
Coupon validation - case insensitive
Booking creation - successful with all required fields
Booking retrieval - by ID returns correct data
Booking with coupon - coupon code saved correctly
Contact form submission - works with and without phone
Homepage loads correctly with all sections
Email popup appears immediately on homepage (800ms delay)
Email popup does NOT appear on /rezervace page
Email popup closes and doesn't show again in same session (sessionStorage)
Email subscription via popup works and displays coupon
5-step booking flow - Service selection works
5-step booking flow - Property details with price calculation
5-step booking flow - Calendar date picker (Sundays disabled)
5-step booking flow - Contact info with coupon validation
5-step booking flow - Confirmation page displays correctly
Coupon validation in booking - invalid coupon shows error
Coupon validation in booking - valid coupon shows success
Navigation - Services page (/sluzby)
Navigation - Pricing page (/cenik)
Navigation - About page (/o-nas)
Navigation - Contact page (/kontakt)
Navigation - Booking page (/rezervace)
Navigation - Homepage
action_items: Optional: Configure REACT_APP_GA_ID environment variable to enable Google Analytics tracking
Optional: Configure ADMIN_EMAIL to receive booking notifications
Optional: Configure RESEND_AUDIENCE_ID for newsletter contact management
seed_data_creation: Test bookings and subscriptions created with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core functionality verified working. Backend has 26 pytest tests covering pricing, booking, subscription, coupon validation, contact form, and availability APIs. Frontend email popup, booking flow, and navigation all tested via Playwright. MOCKED: addToCalendar function in server.py is a placeholder - Google Calendar integration not implemented yet.

mocked_apis.addToCalendar: Google Calendar integration is a placeholder - not implemented

environment_notes.RESEND_AUDIENCE_ID: Not configured - Resend Contacts integration disabled
